name: Learn French with Astérix: Le Fils d'Astérix: Disk Two
overview: LEARN FRENCH WITH Astérix: Disk 2. Learn French while you follow the exciting adventures of Asterix, the small but prodigiously brave warrior of Gaul, who draws his strength from a certain magic potion. In this story Asterix, more comfortable skirmishing with Romans than changing nappies, finds himself adopted by a very special baby. Find out how he copes! Whether you're fifteen or fifty... whether you're an enthusiastic beginner, or dusting down your old school French, or already strong in the language... whether you're studying on your own or taking classes... this program has something to offer. Discs One and Two together give you: • An entertaining story, with almost 60 minutes of spoken French in the words of over 30 different characters. • Teaching notes for each caption, explaining vocabulary and grammatical points, and giving further related examples. • Over 400 Uderzo cartoon drawings in full colour. • A complete English translation of the story in text. • Over 1500 vocabulary items.
